about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Winter 2019 White] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
White Carpet
Plain Red
Snowman Poster
Table Snowman
Snowflakes Neon (Animated)
White Counter
Modern Register
Ball Ornament
Snowy Tree
Wreath White
White Round
String Light
Winter Garland White
Deer Bud White

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
